lb:
During an [Airstrike], all Squadrons will launch 10 more planes.
Healthy upgraded to Level 2.
Bombers will drop their payloads before being engaged by enemy Anti-Air fire.

During Day Battle, increases all damage by 30%.
Healthy upgraded to Level 3.
Increases aircraft reserves for all categories by 50 aircraft each.

During Day Battle, gains the ability to launch an [Airstrike] immediately that deals 50% damage. This attack will not incur any plane loss.
Healthy upgraded to Level 4.

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Airstrikes: Can launch attacks from the map and in battle, has infinite range, reload time when used on map: 60s in battle: 25
Reconnaissance: Planes can be sent when on the map to reveal the fog of war, reload time: 10s

skills.name:
Forward Airgroup
先鋒航空隊
skills.text: 1. During map mode, increase damage of [Airstrike] by 50%.

skills.name:
Independent Airgroup
独立航空隊
skills.text:
1. During battle, if enemy fleet launches an [Airstrike] at own fleet, Hornet obtains a special [Airstrike] that deals 50% damage.
If used or not used within 15 seconds,  this skill will disappear, [Airstrike] CD will not be affected. Can only proc 2 times per battle.

comment: Hornet has a straightforward and open personality. She will believe quotes written on notes she finds, without knowing that it contains the dark past of its owner...
